pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, June 3, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Survivors and participate in a private ceremony for the third anniversary of the release of the final report from the National Inquiry into Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls.

Closed to media

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks virtually at the Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ Annual Conference and Trade Show.

Note for media:

  • Media interested in watching the event live can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
